ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] re: Harm's unique look
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes we can :)  One of the female wood elf bards in my guild has a druid outfit she likes to goof-off in to confuse newbies.  She has a GWC, leather armor, and
ygData.messageBody:
Yes we can :) One of the female wood elf bards in my guild has a druid
outfit she likes to goof-off in to confuse newbies. She has a GWC, leather
armor, and wears her Imbrued boots (look just like Efreeti booties). It is
pretty funny.

Rokenn

-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 23, 2000 1:33 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] re: Harm's unique look


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

>
> Another fun weapon to get Harm is the Ogre War Maul (aka 2h clown hammer).
> Bard wieldable 2h Blunt, woohoo!
>

Can we wield a GWC too?

Harm.
